body: @zheng-xq Somehow I thought that you didn't want the subclassing, in addition to suggesting the functor pattern to address the GPU compilation units. If it's OK to leave for now, I can fix that when I do the saturation PR later. Hopefully it's not too much template bloat relative to Eigen. :)
